name: Panophobia (Jam - Edition)
description:
Fear of everything.
=

 Panophobia is a metroidvania with randomly generated rooms that change when you exit them. Take control of a girl jumping into a well filled with a huge network of rooms and mushroom monsters. The gameplay of the game consists in the passage of a huge cave, consisting of randomly selected rooms, forming a network of levels in which the game takes place. In the game there are enemies, currency and merchants. The character has a health bar, a coin counter, a stress bar, and an item in hand. Before the game, the player has a choice between three fears that block one of the character's abilities: 

 Hydrophobia (Fear of water) 

Removes the ability to swim from the character in the water Increased stress around water. 

 Acrophobia (Fear of heights)

Removes the ability for the character to fall more than 10 tiles. Player dies when falling Increased stress if the character is above the height of 5 tiles.

 Nyctophobia (Fear of the dark) 

Removes the ability to enter dark rooms Increased stress in dark rooms.

=
"This game stinks." - PyroGuy, Programmer

"We lost the Pen#s Level ((("  -  Vurt (NoMoreVurt),  Level Designer

"We made horror game listening "Silly goofy goober playlist"." - Myrick,  Lead Artist

"I lost all my friends during development of this game." - Dinebon_, Composer, Artist
